item.title: Peterbilt 350 v1.0.6 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 20, 2025

Peterbilt 350 v1.0.6 ATS

Changelogs 1.0.6
– added support for Missouri event rewards
– added support for driving academy reward
– fixed issue with air filter mounting band missing from painted classic/floating on chrome classic

V1.0.5
– corner radii of interior mirror models have higher resolution now
– fixed a number of missing/subpar shadow casters
– Grote mirror w/ light now acts properly as marker lights instead of signals
– added some marker light options from the 351
– added support for val25 event rewards
– air filter mounting bands improved

Features
– 6 Cabins
– 11 Chassis
– 19 Engines with own sounds
– 4 Interiors
– Paintjob system
– More transmissions
– Tuning parts
– Accessories
– Standalone
– Compatible game 1.54.x

Credits: Smarty, Kriechbaum

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Peterbilt 351 v1.0.1 1.54 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 20, 2025

Peterbilt 351 v1.0.1 1.54 ATS

Changelog
*reup 1.0.1, missing driving academy reward

V1.0.1
– interior shadow support
– improved exterior and interior cabin sun shadows
– event reward compatibility through Cruising Missouri
– added support for driving academy reward
– corrected lights on Grote mirrors, now acting as marker lights
– fixed missing smoke mirror on ‘that truck’s’ used vehicle config
– ‘fixed’ dealer config to have a 0 level requirement (170 chassis instead of 190 by default)
– air filter mounting bands improved

Description:
Peterbilt’s lightweight model 351 was a worthy successor to the model 350, offering shorter wheelbases and more optimized weight distribution. The difference in sales numbers is very telling, with over 7000 351’s being sold 1954-1976 vs 847 350’s 1949-1957. It’s fairly safe to say that the 351 was the model that really drove Peterbilt conventionals to the success they continue to enjoy.

This mod seeks to recapture some of the magic of this pivotal truck model, including one of its iconic movie appearances!

Helpful Hints:
Pay careful attention when configuring the chassis, engine, and transmission. The standard chassis use double reduction rear axles (Rockwell SLDD) and so only slow ratios are available (4.68 to 5.90). This is best suited to the more ‘vintage’ engine selections by trading off speed for more torque at the wheels. There are also chassis with Hendrickson RS or Stabilaire suspension and SQHD rears (ratios 3.70 to 4.63) which pair well with more recent engines.

Credits: Smarty

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Pyla map add-on v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 20, 2025

Pyla map add-on v1.0 ETS2

Add-on for the surroundings of Bordeaux and Pyla-sur-Mer via Winchester

Pyla-sur-Mer is a French seaside resort on the Atlantic coast, at the entrance to the Arcachon Bay, in the Gironde department and the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region.
The Dune of Pilat is a dune located in Gironde at the entrance to the Arcachon Bay, on the Silver Coast, bordering the Landes de Gascogne forest in southwestern France. It is the highest dune in Europe.

COMPATIBILITY
The mod currently works with Promods and the base map, the South of France add-ons, and the tour.
If you wish to play with Promods, you must place the Pyla mod above the Promods files in the mod loading order.
Works with 1.54.x

Credits: Winchester

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: US Car Culture v1.5 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 20, 2025

US Car Culture v1.5 ETS2

All vehicles have been reclassified according to their proper segment (Compact to Full-size, Muscle, Pony, etc.) and type (SUVs, Passengers, Pickup Trucks).
All vehicles’ spawn rates have been adjusted, with the ratio based on brands’ market share and the model popularity itself.
Realistic vehicle specs make AI acceleration and speed look more natural.
Diversity between classic, modern, and sport vehicles with add-ons, helps improve the AI spawn to be as realistic as possible.
Some rare vehicles will now actually be “rare” and would need ideal weather, time, etc conditions to catch a sight of it.

LOAD ORDER (VANILLA):
Traffic density/ Realistic Traffic mod
US Car Culture add-ons (Doesn’t require main mod).
US Car Culture v1.5
Supported AI Traffic Pack
Map mods

Added support for 1 new state: LOUISIANA
Current Car/UV/Pickup Truck market-share: 32.2%/32.1%/30.7%
Adjusted all vehicles’ spawn rate.
Released RTD Edition for Jazzycat’s Classic Car, they will follow Classic spawn
Updated models spawn rate
Adjusted muscle/touring car spawn rate to match with add-on ratio as they are being forced to follow normal car spawn rules. [MAIN MOD]
Adjusted classic/antique car spawn rate to match with add-on ratio as they are being forced to follow normal car spawn rules. [MAIN MOD]
Adjusted EV spawn rate to match with add-on ratio. [MAIN MOD]
Fixed Dodge Magnum LX spawn rate in Missouri. [MAIN MOD]
Increased spawn count and frequency by 80% for muscle/touring cars in RTD Edition. [JAZZYCAT’S AI TRAFFIC]
Increased van spawn rate by 50% in Texas and New Mexico. [JAZZYCAT’S AI TRAFFIC]
Decreased EV spawn rate by 15% in Arizona, by 35% in Nevada and Colorado, by 50% in Utah. [JAZZYCAT’S AI TRAFFIC]
Increased luxury brands pawn rate by 15% in Arkansas and Iowa. [JAZZYCAT’S AI TRAFFIC]
Fixed Oldsmobile 442 spawn condition. [JAZZYCAT’S CLASSIC CAR]
Fixed Toyota 2000 GT’s variants spawn error. [JAZZYCAT’S CLASSIC CAR]
Fixed Jaguar XK-E’s variants spawn error. [JAZZYCAT’S CLASSIC CAR]
Fixed several pointer reference errors. [JAZZYCAT’S CLASSIC CAR]
Adjusted taxi and truck spawn rate. [GRLK3512’S GTA V CAR]
Fixed GTA 4 Fortune spawn rate. [GRLK3512’S FICTIONAL CAR]
Significantly reduced Lamborghini Huracan and Mitsubishi Lancer X spawn rate. [GRLK3512’S ETS2 CAR]

Credits: justheretolurk

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
